Description: Fragment of round handle of an Apulian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay near fine buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 201, 14. Name Scopas. D. Manacorda and S. Pallecchi, Le fornace romane di Giancola (Bari, 2012) 322, A1.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1268)
